name: no_input
description:
╔╗╔╔═╗    ╦╔╗╔╔═╗╦ ╦╔╦╗

║║║║ ║    ║║║║╠═╝║ ║ ║ 

╝╚╝╚═╝────╩╝╚╝╩  ╚═╝ ╩ 

By Jesse Escobar

No_Input is a music visualizer composed of 

3 songs.

1. Thought Tempo - How the body feels

2. Meishi Smile - Hate Floods Slow

3. Spamtron - Area88

Pulling from 8 frequency audio bands, I created 3 different 

visuals that you can rotate and ‘purge’ for varied effects.

I was inspired by the chiptune scene and it’s various visual

artists. I don’t like Pokemon that much, pikachu is just there.

W/A/S/D to Rotate

P to ‘Purge’ screen

Alpha 1,2,3 to Change Songs

Return(enter) to Begin

*Do not play in ‘windowed mode’ as it sometimes doesn’t work properly

on some machines.*
